$!You may need to tell DVLA about your diabetes, depending on how it's treated and the licence you have.$!

##Diabetes treated by tablets

###Car or motorcycle licence

You don't need to tell DVLA. For further information read leaflet 'TAB1'. 

$D
[Download 'TAB1 - Information for drivers with diabetes treated by non-insulin medication, diet, or both' (PDF, 224KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_067957.pdf "Leaflet 'TAB1 (Information for drivers with diabetes treated by non-insulin medication, diet, or both' (PDF, 224KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D


###Bus, coach or lorry licence

You must tell DVLA. Fill in form 'DIAB1V' and send it to DVLA. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download ‘DIAB1V - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 315KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_078900.pdf "Download ‘DIAB1V - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 315KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

If you want to apply for vocational entitlement to drive larger vehicles (C1, C1E, D1, DIE, C, CE, D or DE) download leaflet 'INS186' to find out how.

$D
[Download 'INS186 - A guide for drivers with diabetes who wish to apply for Vocational Entitlement' (PDF, 230KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_179198.pdf "Download 'INS186 - A guide for drivers with insulin-treated diabetes who wish to 
apply for Vocational Entitlement' (PDF, 230KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

##Diabetes treated by insulin

###Car, motorcycle, bus, coach or lorry licence

You must tell DVLA. Fill in form 'DIAB1V' and send it to DVLA. The address is on the form.

$D
[Download ‘DIAB1V - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 315KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_078900.pdf "Download ‘DIAB1V - Confidential medical information’ (PDF, 315KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

If you want to apply for vocational entitlement to drive larger vehicles (C1, C1E, D1, DIE, C, CE, D or DE) download leaflet 'INS186' to find out how.


$D
[Download 'INS186 - A guide for drivers with diabetes who wish to apply for Vocational Entitlement' (PDF, 230KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_179198.pdf "Download 'INS186 - A guide for drivers with diabetes who wish to apply for Vocational Entitlement' (PDF, 230KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

Further information on the [standards and requirements for drivers with diabetes treated with insulin](http://www.dft.gov.uk/dvla/medical/Annex%203%20changes%20to%20Diabetes%20update.aspx "information for drivers with diabetes treated with insulin"){:rel="external"} can be found on the Department for Transport website.


##Diabetes treated by diet

###Car or motorcycle licence

You don't need to tell DVLA. For further information please read leaflet 'TAB1'. 

$D
[Download 'TAB1 - Information for drivers with diabetes treated by non-insulin medication, diet, or both' (PDF, 224KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_067957.pdf "Download 'TAB1 - Information for drivers with diabetes treated by non-insulin medication, diet, or both' (PDF, 224KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D



###Bus, coach or lorry licence

You don't need to tell DVLA. For further information read leaflet 'VDIET' ('Lorry and/or bus drivers with diabetes treated by diet alone') for more information.

$D
[Download ‘VDIET - Lorry and/or bus drivers with diabetes treated by diet alone’ (PDF, 130KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_197318.pdf "Download ‘VDIET - Lorry and/or bus drivers with diabetes treated by diet alone’ (PDF, 130KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

If you want to apply for vocational entitlement to drive larger vehicles (C1, C1E, D1, DIE, C, CE, D or DE) download leaflet 'INS186' to find out how.

$D
[Download 'INS186 - A guide for drivers with diabetes who wish to apply for Vocational Entitlement' (PDF, 230KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@motor/documents/digitalasset/dg_179198.pdf "Download 'INS186 - A guide for drivers with diabetes who wish to apply for Vocational Entitlement' (PDF, 230KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

*[DVLA]: Driver Vehicle and Licensing Agency
overview: Diabetes is a medical condition you may need to tell DVLA about
